page.title: 03HULL PRISON
page.content: {Hull Prison is a maximum security {prison.} One person in a hundred who apply get a job as a prison warden.Trainees go to training school for a month.After two months they can get posted anywhere in England.Being a prison warden can be a very{dangerous}job because they are risking their lives.The prison wardens earn about 15000-20000 pounds a year(they earn it). They have three inmates to a cell.They have one hour to get their dinner.The inmates are the most violent men in England.They don't have to wear special uniforms and they are allowed to get people to do their shopping. They get four pound a week to spend. Sometimes if they get mad with you they get their excrement,mix it all together and pour it all over you.
